overview: This 50-minute DVD documentary on the life of professional wrestling legend Lou Thesz includes footage from a David L. Wolper project on Thesz from the 1950s on Thesz. Wolper went on to become one of Hollywoodâ€™s top movie producers. The documentary was produced by hall of fame wrestling historian Mike Chapman of Newton, Iowa.
title: Lou Thesz: An American Icon
